originalTitle: Sassy Fascination Water Works (STEM)
originalBody:
Sassy Fascination Water Works (STEM)
Age: 12 months +
As a child begins play with the Fascination Water Works, they begin to understand why things happen and how things work. The scooping cup allows for the child to fill, measure and pour water, introducing the concept of math. Moving parts within each tube will fascinate and keep her engaged! Connect the pieces together to create a chain or separate for individual play. 
Moving parts pique a child's interest as the learn the cause and effect of adding water to the toy
Interchangeable tubes snap together, providing manipulation challenge appropriate for little hands
Spinning parts encourage a higher level of eye tracking and visual exploration
Scooping cup allows baby to fill, measure and pour water, introducing the concept of math
Through number recognition, baby is introduced to the concept of math
The Fascination Water Works promotes early STEM learning by teaching a child about:
- Observation
- Simple machine
- Constructing
title: 迷人水上樂趣 (STEM)
body:
迷人水上樂趣 (STEM)
年齡：12個月以上
當孩子開始玩迷人水上樂趣時，他們開始理解事情發生的原因和事物如何運作。舀水杯讓孩子可以填充、測量和倒水，引入數學概念。每個管道內的移動部件會讓孩子著迷並保持專注！將各部件連接在一起以創建一條鏈或分開進行個別遊戲。
移動部件引起孩子的興趣，讓他們了解將水添加到玩具的原因和效果
可互換的管道可快速連接在一起，提供適合小手操作的挑戰
旋轉部件鼓勵更高水平的眼球追蹤和視覺探索
舀水杯讓寶寶可以填充、測量和倒水，引入數學概念
通過數字認識，寶寶認識數學概念
迷人水上樂趣通過教導孩子以下內容促進早期STEM學習：
- 觀察
- 簡單機械
- 構建

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO Diapers / 無敏環保紙尿片 Size-1 (NB/初生) 28pc
originalBody:
6 packs per case / 每箱6包
Bambo Nature Rash Free ECO disposable diapers are gentle to the child’s skin and health and have a very soft textile-like back and top sheet that makes the diaper feel like soft clothing. The diaper is designed to fit a child’s anatomy perfectly, which ensures there is no leakage and makes the child feel comfortable while enabling greater freedom of movement.
Our disposable baby diapers are among the most environment-friendly diapers on the market. They are manufactured with care for the environment, and 95 % of all waste coming from the production of Bambo Nature is recycled. Furthermore, the diapers are labeled with the Nordic Eco-label, the FSC®-label, the Asthma Allergy label and are Dermatologically Tested.
Bambo Nature are proud to present all the certifications to ensure all mothers that their babies skin will be free from all the harmful chemicals. We can guarantee that!
2-5KG / 4-11 LBS

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Training Pants Size-5 (XL) 19pc
originalBody:
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
12-18KG / 27-40LBS
 
 Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-5, XL, 12-18 Kg, 19 pcs/pack
 
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner design
Improve moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
Softer
Use better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.
title: Bambo Nature Training Pants Size-5 (XL) 19pc
body:
Bambo Nature的環保一次性訓練褲不含有害化學物質和所有已知過敏原。這些訓練褲設計讓孩子學習上廁所變得容易。您的幼兒將感覺像個大孩子，因為我們的訓練褲採用了柔軟、薄和易拉上拉下的設計。我們的訓練褲採用三層設計，具有超吸收核心，可以應對多次濕潤，甚至是整夜。就像我們的尿布一樣，Bambo Nature訓練褲具有全透氣背板，保持嬰兒嬌嫩皮膚乾爽。
12-18公斤 / 27-40磅
 
丹麥無過敏環保嬰兒學習褲，尺寸5，XL，12-18公斤，19片裝
 
新升級功能！
 
濕度指示器
開發了市場上最佳和最高質量的濕度顯示。100％不含有害化學物質和不過敏。液體敏感條會變色以指示濕度。
 
更薄的設計
改進了吸濕技術，實現最大吸收和保水能力。
學習褲更薄，更舒適，不會影響吸收和保水能力。
 
更柔軟
使用更好和更柔軟的材料增強舒適度和保護性。
 
Bambo Nature Dream的改進功能帶來了更清新和更舒適的體驗，保持乾爽，減少濕疹的可能性。
 
產品描述：
Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。
為了獲得這個標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中包括：
我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表明我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉來自可持續森林。在這裡，必須種植更多的樹木。
同時，我們的產品也通過了不同獨立機構的測試，以確保Bambo Nature的尿布不會引起皮膚敏感或刺激。
為了配合兒童的上廁所訓練，Bambo Nature訓練褲的設計讓他們可以輕鬆拉上拉下。此外，必要時，訓練褲也可以從側面打開。
Bambo Nature訓練褲的優勢
· 這種環保尿布絕對是孩子學習上廁所的好幫手
· 不含氯、螢光劑和潤膚劑
· 訓練褲中的木漿和棉花均來自自由可持續森林
· 腰圍和腳圍不含乳膠
· 不含氯漂白
· 透氣背墊讓孩子的皮膚呼吸，避免皮膚敏感。

originalTitle: Sassy Wonder Wheel
originalBody:
Sassy Wonder Wheel
Age: 6 months +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
Capture baby’s attention with the spinning wheel, cascading beads and bright colors of the Wonder Wheel! The spinning wheel encourages baby to reach, tug, and bat, strengthening hand-eye coordination. Trapped within the clear structure are colorful beads, which help baby connect the sound to sight. The spinning center pieces provide a higher level of visual tracking and strengthen fine motor skills. The wonder wheel has multiple texture points, encouraging baby’s tactile exploration. Plus, the suction cup base attaches to flat surfaces such as high chairs and table tops for frustration-free play.
Additional Product Details
Spinning wheel encourages baby to reach, tug, and bat, strengthening hand-eye coordination
Spinning center pieces provide a higher level of visual tracking and strengthen fine motor skills
Colorful beads trapped within the clear structure allows baby to connect the sound to sight
Suction cup base attaches to solid surfaces for frustration-free play

body:

originalTitle: Fin Fun Shark Fin Blue
originalBody:
Fin Fun Shark Fin Blue
Ready for hours of fun in the pool? Fin Fun’s exclusive Blue Shark Fin has been redesigned with a soft, ultra-lightweight foam-like material that has been engineered just for Fin Fun! It features adjustable straps that are built for comfort and endurance. Children and adults of all ages will love pretending they’re a scary shark in this fun, imaginative Shark Fin.
This playful blue Fin Fun Shark Fin will have your kids in a frenzy! Our Shark Fin is an exciting new toy for pool games and a wonderful incentive for young swimmers to get in the pool. From toddlers to adults, the straps on our Shark Fin are comfortable, adjustable, and feature a new double-stitched buckle that secures the fin on your child for maximum water movement. Plus, our unique design features shoulder straps that enhance the safety and fit. Our Shark Fin is made from a durable ultra-lightweight foam-like material that resists stains and tears but is soft to the touch. Patent Pending.
Sizes:
Shark Fin – Our Shark Fin is adjustable and fits most chest sizes. Will fit up to a Men’s XL in most cases!
Materials & Care
100% Polyolefin
Hand rinse after each use. Air dry before storing. Avoid use of machine washers and dryers to clean, as straps may become tangled and worn.
title: Fin Fun 藍色鯊魚鰭
body:
Fin Fun 藍色鯊魚鰭
準備好在泳池中玩上幾個小時了嗎？Fin Fun 獨家設計的藍色鯊魚鰭已經重新設計，採用柔軟、超輕的泡沫材料，專為 Fin Fun 而製。它配有可調節的帶子，舒適耐用。無論是孩子還是成人，都會喜歡在這個有趣的鯊魚鰭中假裝成可怕的鯊魚。
這款有趣的藍色 Fin Fun 鯊魚鰭將讓您的孩子瘋狂！我們的鯊魚鰭是泳池遊戲的一個令人興奮的新玩具，也是激勵年輕游泳者進入泳池的好動力。從幼兒到成人，我們的鯊魚鰭帶子舒適、可調節，並配有新的雙針縫扣，可確保鰭子在您的孩子身上最大程度地移動。此外，我們獨特的設計還包括可增強安全性和合適性的肩帶。我們的鯊魚鰭採用耐污染和撕裂的耐用超輕泡沫材料製成，觸感柔軟。專利申請中。
尺寸：
鯊魚鰭 - 我們的鯊魚鰭可調節，適合大多數胸部尺寸。在大多數情況下，可適合男性 XL 尺碼！
材質與護理
100％ 聚烯烴
每次使用後用水沖洗。在存放前晾乾。避免使用洗衣機和烘乾機清洗，以免帶子纏結和磨損。

originalTitle: ThinkFun Code Master™
originalBody:
ThinkFun Code Master™
Age: 8 yrs +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
 
Empowering Minds Through Play
ThinkFun is the world’s leader in addictively fun games that stretch and sharpen your mind. From lighting up young minds to creating fun for the whole family, our innovative games make you think while they make you smile.
The Ultimate Coding Board Game
 Featured in Purdue University's Engineering Gift Guide
Make programming fun by learning the basics without a computer! In Code Master, your Avatar travels to an exotic world in search of power Crystals. Along the way, you use programming logic to navigate the Map. Think carefully, in each level, only one specific sequence of actions will lead to success. Once you collect all the Crystals and land at the Portal, you win! Playing Code Master won’t just teach you principles behind programming, you’ll also build planning, sequential reasoning and problem-solving skills.

originalTitle: Brush Buddies Poppin' Leapin Louie (Frog) Toothbrush
originalBody:
Brush Buddies Poppin' Leapin Louie (Frog) Toothbrush
Brush Buddies Poppin' Louie Frog makes brushing fun! Press the belly button and the brush pops up. All 5 fun characters come with soft bristles, which are gentle on children's gums.
Features :
Soft bristles so they are gentle on your young ones teeth and gums
Flexible brush head to withstand the bending, pushing, and poppin’ action of the brush while kids play with the brush
In/Out lock: once the brush is opened it will lock in place to allow our young brushers to brush their teeth. Once they are done brushing, press the belly button, push the brush head back into the body to lock in its close position, and then place the brush head cover on top of the bristles
Drip holes: at the bottom of the character you will notice two drip holes, these were designed to let all the water drain out
Standing design: all our character can free stand on their own, eliminating toothbrush holder in the bathroom
BPA free: safety is first on our mind and we have developed all our products to be safe for your young ones
Brush head cover: each of the character's heads are fun and at the same time are a great way to protect the bristles from getting damaged as they act as a brush head cover
Benefits :
Fun animal characters that motivate kids to brush their teeth with their best pals
The poppin’ action makes it fun to brush their teeth
Watch your child enjoy brushing their teeth on their own

title: Brush Buddies Poppin' Toothy Toby (Tiger) Toothbrush
body:
Brush Buddies Poppin' Toothy Toby (Tiger) Toothbrush 讓刷牙變得有趣！按下肚臍按鈕，刷子就會彈出來。所有5款有趣的角色都配有柔軟刷毛，溫和地保護孩子的牙齦。
特色：
柔軟刷毛，溫和保護孩子的牙齦
柔軟刷頭，能承受刷子彈跳、推動和按壓的動作

立式設計：所有角色都可以自由站立，不需要牙刷架
不含BPA：我們將安全放在首位，所有產品都經過安全設計
刷頭套：每個角色的頭部都有趣，同時也是保護刷毛不受損壞的好方法
好處：
有趣的動物角色激勵孩子與他們的好朋友一起刷牙

看著孩子自己享受刷牙的樂趣

originalTitle: All Terrain Herbal Armour DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 8 oz. / 240ml
originalBody:
All Terrain Herbal Armour DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 8 oz. / 240ml
Safe, DEET-Free Insect Repellent, Natural
All Terrain sells effective skin protection products containing safe and clean ingredients to help people live more active, healthier lives. All Terrain’s products try to disprove the myth that if the products contain natural-based ingredients, it can’t work as well as chemical-based products. The products are developed by and for outdoor enthusiasts for use whether trekking in the backcountry or relaxing with family in your backyard.  In addition to wanting people to live healthier lives, the company is based on caring and a desire to protect the environment.
Enjoying an outdoor lifestyle comes with many benefits, but insects are not one of them! From hiking in the deep woods to lounging in the backyard, Herbal Armor DEET-free, Natural Insect Repellent is an effective and safe solution that uses a unique and extremely effective mixture of six essential oils (soybean, citronella, peppermint, cedar, lemongrass and geranium), to protect you from mosquitoes and other pesky insects, naturally. 
Keep your family safe and protected with All Terrain’s effective DEET-free insect repellent formula, while feeling good about how it is non-toxic and is not harmful to the environment. Herbal Armor Insect Repellent is perfect for active/adventurist people and families on the go.
• DEET-free
• GMO-free
• Over 26% active ingredients – among the highest 
• Uses six repelling oils – among the highest 
• Independently proven non-irritating & allergy tested
• Good for children and those with sensitive skin
• Won’t dame clothing or equipment

title: 安娜貝爾卡梅爾有機嬰兒貝殼形意大利麵
body:
安娜貝爾卡梅爾有機嬰兒貝殼形意大利麵
適合年齡：7個月以上
淨重：250克
製造地：意大利
過敏提示：含小麥和麩質。在處理雞蛋和大豆的工廠生產。
安娜貝爾卡梅爾擁有超過25年的職業生涯，倫敦出生的三個孩子的母親安娜貝爾卡梅爾，開創了全球家庭餵養嬰兒和兒童的方式。
憑藉她可靠的食譜和方法開啟了一場食品革命，她已成為英國頭號兒童烹飪作家，暢銷國際作家，以及擁有45本烹飪書的餵養專家之母...並且還在不斷增加中。
由100％有機硬質小麥製成，添加安娜貝爾卡梅爾的有機小意大利麵形狀到美味的泥狀食物或醬汁中有助於引入質地，並鼓勵嬰兒咀嚼。也非常適合與肉類、魚類或蔬菜結合。
產品特色：
無添加劑或防腐劑
添加維生素B1
烹飪時間為6分鐘
可製作多達12餐
只使用最好的成分：有機硬質小麥粉、維生素B1

originalTitle: ECO Seal Cup Trio
originalBody:
Plastic-free and leak-proof, the Seal Cup™ Trio is a three-piece set ideal for packing a variety of foods and keeping them separate.
The containers are nesting, so you can pack up to a total of 5 cups of food in the morning and after you've eaten you can compactly tote them home by nesting each container inside the other. How nifty is that?
The non-toxic Seal Cup Trio makes your lunches greener and our oceans cleaner by keeping dangerous plastics out of your lunch and our oceans.
The Seal Cup Trio and all our Blue Water Bento collection lunch containers are designed FOR the ocean and BY the ocean. It's the beauty of our oceans that has inspired all our designs.
Product Dimensions:
 
Large container measures 4.75” diameter by 2.25” tall. Capacity is 20 oz. (2.5 cups). Tare weight is 4.4 oz.
Medium container measures 4.1” diameter by 2.1” tall. Capacity is 12 oz. (1.5 cups). Tare weight is 3.1 oz.
Small container measures 3.5” diameter by 2" tall. Capacity is 8 oz. (1 cup). Tare weight is 2.1 oz.
Product Details:
Total set capacity: 
40 oz. (5 cups)
Total set weight: 
9.6 oz.
Tare weights are etched on the bottom of each container so they may be used at food bars and delis that charge by food weight
Non-toxic silicone lid and type 304 stainless container are free of estrogen-mimicking chemicals commonly found in plastics like BPA, BPS, and phthalates
All parts are dishwasher and oven safe Not for use in the microwave
Steel and silicone container is lighter than glass containers and nonbreakable.
Made responsibly in China
title: ECO Seal Cup Trio
body:
ECO Seal Cup Trio是一套三件套，不含塑料且防漏，非常適合裝各種食物並保持它們分開。
這些容器可以互相套入，早上可以裝入總共5杯食物，吃完後可以將它們緊湊地套在一起帶回家。多方便啊！
無毒的Seal Cup Trio讓您的午餐更環保，讓我們的海洋更清潔，避免危險的塑料進入您的午餐和我們的海洋。
Seal Cup Trio和我們所有的Blue Water Bento系列午餐盒都是為了海洋而設計的，由海洋啟發。我們所有設計的美麗來自於海洋。

originalTitle: ECO 3-in-1 Splash Box
originalBody:
With its 
modular design
 and 
leak-proof lids
, the 
3-in-1 Splash Box
 is a three-piece set that stacks and nests. It’s a powerful plastic-free lunchtime tool that has been designed as a 2.0 remix of our best selling ECOlunchbox 3-in-1 and Blue Water Bento Splash Box
We think you’ll love the 
space-saving design
 featuring three food compartments, including upstairs and downstairs sections as well as a nesting snack container called the Mini Splash Pod, which tucks inside the top layer. Plus, what’s not to love about no-leak lids?

Our Three-in-One is perfect packing a healthy entree and two side dishes. Not only is it 100% stainless steel and plastic-free, but it has a modular design with compartments for a full course meal!

stainless steel

originalTitle: ECO Three-in-One Giant
originalBody:
Do you have a giant lunchtime appetite? 
A 100% stainless steel bento box, the ECO Three-in-One Giant, holds an impressive 8 cups of food in three separate food containers that nest and clip together.
The Giant, which is the largest bento in the ECOlunchbox collection, is an amazing piece planet-friendly, non-toxic lunch hardware designed to handle generous portion sizes. Twice the size of ECO Three-in-One Classic, with same great quality. 
Product Details
Rugged, large size stainless steel lunchbox is non-toxic, plastic-free and waste-free.
3 sections to keep food separated.
When clipped closed, the Giant measures all together 5 1/4 inches wide, 7 inches long and 3 inches high. 
The upper and lower levels of the two-tiered bento each hold 3.5 cups (28 oz). The top layer is 1.75 inches deep and sits on top of the bottom layer, which is 1.25 inches deep.
The rectangular nesting container with lid measures 2 1/2 inches wide by 4 3/4 inches long by 1 5/8 inches high (interior dimension is 1.5 inches) and holds 1 cup. This container can be either packed separately or tucked in the top level of the metal lunchbox.
The clips can be adjusted to desired stiffness. 
The Three-in-One Giant is not leak proof. Damp foods, such as cut fruit, hummus and other thick sauces, work well in our containers. Our lids don't have any plastic gaskets or other added synthetics to create a seal. Therefore, sauces and liquids may leak.
Not for use in the microwave. Food may be reheated in the metal containers in a medium-heat oven or over a campstove. Try our pot gripper for easy handling!
Dishwasher safe.
Made in India.
title: ECO 三合一巨型便當盒
body:
您有巨大的午餐胃口嗎？
ECO 三合一巨型便當盒是一款100%不鏽鋼製成的便當盒，可分為三個獨立的食物容器，容量高達8杯，並可嵌套並夾在一起。
這款巨型便當盒是ECOlunchbox系列中最大的便當盒，是一款非常環保、無毒的午餐器具，設計用於容納大份量的食物。比ECO 三合一經典款大一倍，品質同樣出色。
產品詳情
堅固、大尺寸的不鏽鋼便當盒，無毒、無塑料、無廢棄物。
3個區域可將食物分開。
夾緊時，巨型便當盒整體尺寸為5 1/4英寸寬、7英寸長和3英寸高。
雙層便當的上下層分別可容納3.5杯（28盎司）。上層深1.75英寸，放在下層上方，下層深1.25英寸。
帶蓋的矩形嵌套容器尺寸為2 1/2英寬、4 3/4英長、1 5/8英高（內部尺寸為1.5英寸），可容納1杯。此容器可單獨打包或放在金屬便當盒的上層。
夾子可調整至所需的堅硬度。
三合一巨型便當盒不防漏。潮濕食物，如切水果、鷹嘴豆泥和其他濃稠醬料，在我們的容器中表現良好。我們的蓋子沒有任何塑料墊圈或其他添加的合成物質來創造密封。因此，醬料和液體可能會滲漏。
不適用於微波爐。食物可在中火烤箱或露營爐上加熱金屬容器。試試我們的鍋夾，方便操作！
可放入洗碗機清洗。
印度製造。
TAGS: ECO午餐盒、容器、ECO

originalTitle: ECO Tri Bento
originalBody:
ECO Tri Bento - 100% Stainless Steel
Stacking and packing a healthy lunch is as easy at 1-2-3 with the elegant ECOlunchbox Tri Bento that's made up of
 
three separate layers which neatly clip together
. 
Each lunch container in the stacking Tri Bento metal lunchbox set is made from non-toxic stainless steel and is portioned for a healthy lunch or snack.
The shape of the Tri Bento lunchbox is classic of the round stainless steel "tiffins" that have been used for generations throughout India. The Tri Bento metal lunchbox, however, is a stand-out due to the exceptional quality of the workmanship as well as the
 
easy-to-use clips
 
that won't pinch. It's the perfect lunchbox for packing a trio of your favorite lunch foods! 
Because all ECOlunchbox lunch containers are made from durable, reusable materials, you can reduce your impact on the planet all while enjoying perfectly-portioned, fresh meals on-the-go.

originalTitle: Woobamboo Toothbrush Adult Soft
originalBody:
Woobamboo Toothbrush Adult Soft
Brand: Woobamboo
Made responsibly in China (where it is bamboo rich!)
A bamboo toothbrush is a fantastic alternative to the typical plastic or nylon toothbrush – of which over 2 BILLION end up in the world’s landfills every year. The bamboo used in our brushes is sustainably grown, organic, BPA-free, naturally anti-microbial, durable, biodegradable, and hey- it’s stylish, too! WooBamboo also totes the highest quality Dupont Tynex bristles, so your 
dentist would approve, as well.
The only thing standard about our Standard Adult Toothbrushes is the routine of brushing twice a day. Our beautiful bamboo handle provides a wavy grip that sits in the curve of your palm and offers a natural place for your thumb. A very light coating of Chinese white wax coupled with the already anti-microbial nature of bamboo assures you that not only are you doing something healthy for your mouth, but that you are not harvesting a germ fest on the handle. We offer three bristle strengths in beautiful colors to add “pop” to your bathroom counter top. Bamboo and you. It’s a winning combination.
title: Woobamboo 成人軟毛竹牙刷
body:
Woobamboo 成人軟毛竹牙刷
品牌: Woobamboo
在中國負責生產（中國是竹子豐富的地方！）
竹製牙刷是典型塑料或尼龍牙刷的絕佳替代品 - 每年有超過20億支進入世界垃圾填埋場。我們牙刷中使用的竹子是可持續種植、有機、不含BPA、天然抗菌、耐用、可生物降解，而且時尚！Woobamboo 還擁有最高品質的杜邦 Tynex 刷毛，所以您的牙醫也會贊同。
我們標準成人牙刷唯一標準的是每天刷牙兩次的習慣。我們美麗的竹柄提供波浪狀握把，貼合您手掌的曲線，並為您的拇指提供自然位置。中國白蠟的輕微塗層，再加上竹子本身的抗菌特性，確保您不僅為口腔健康做出了貢獻，還不會在柄上滋生細菌。我們提供三種顏色的刷毛強度，為您的浴室櫃台增添“亮點”。竹子與您。這是一個勝利的組合。
TAGS: Woobamboo, 牙科, 環保

originalTitle: Woobamboo Biodegradable Eco Floss Mint 37.5m
originalBody:
Woobamboo Biodegradable Eco Floss Mint 37.5m
Okay, so let’s discuss the elephant in the room: flossing doesn’t necessarily sit at the cool table with oh, say the
 
hot toothbrush
 
or the
 
hunky mouthwash
. But that doesn’t make our buddy floss any less important. It’s actually incredibly important, as it helps get all that funk out from in between your teeth. BUT THEN WHAT? Every time it’s used that means another several feet (usually) of non-biodegradable plastic string ends up in the garbage! You don’t have to be president of the environmental club to imagine what thousands of miles of plastic floss in oceans and landfills can do to our planet’s animal inhabitants.
SO GO NATURAL, BABY!
Our dental floss is made from natural organic silk, and it’s encased in a cool, plant-based plastic shell. We’ve eliminated the need for a plastic case, as the packaging itself becomes your floss dispenser! Pop it open, thread it, close it, use it.  Oh, stick “buy it” in there, first. 🙂 If you want to order our products in bulk or wholesale, we can help you with that too!
 
Made with natural, biodegradable silk
 
Coated with natural wax
 
Packaged in renewable plant-based plastic
 
Soy-based ink & post-consumer waste
 
Finely crafted in Italy
title: Woobamboo 生物可降解環保牙線薄荷味 37.5m
body:
Woobamboo 生物可降解環保牙線薄荷味 37.5m
好吧，讓我們來談談房間裡的大象：牙線可能不像熱門的牙刷或帥氣的漱口水那樣受歡迎。但這並不會讓我們的好朋友牙線變得不重要。實際上，它非常重要，因為它有助於清除牙齒間的所有垃圾。但是然後呢？每次使用時，這意味著又有幾英尺（通常）的不可生物降解塑料牙線最終被丟進垃圾桶！您不必成為環保俱樂部的主席，就可以想像數千英里的塑料牙線在海洋和垃圾填埋場中對我們星球的動物居民造成的影響。
所以走自然路線吧！
我們的牙線是由天然有機絲製成，並包裹在一個很酷的植物基塑料外殼中。我們消除了對塑料盒的需求，因為包裝本身就成為您的牙線分配器！打開它，穿過它，關上它，使用它。哦，首先加上“購買”這個步驟。如果您想批量或批發訂購我們的產品，我們也可以幫助您！
- 使用天然、可生物降解絲製成
- 表面塗有天然蠟
- 包裝使用可再生植物基塑料
- 大豆油墨和後消費廢料
- 在意大利精心製作

title: 萌趣探戈珠寶搖鈴
body:
萌趣探戈珠寶搖鈴是一款柔軟可愛的搖鈴，非常適合寶寶使用。明亮的顏色、不同的材質和多樣的表面幫助刺激寶寶。搖鈴的頸部可彎曲180°，提供了一個完美的手部操作挑戰，有助於寶寶的發展。搖鈴的球體內有對比鮮明的黑白珠子，刺激寶寶發展的視覺，喚醒聽覺意識。此外，明亮的彩色click-clack環提供聽覺刺激，而有紋理的手柄非常適合寶寶咬。
其他產品詳細資訊
不同的材質和表面刺激寶寶的觸覺，教導他們認識新物體
搖鈴的頸部可彎曲180°，提供了完美的手部操作挑戰
對比鮮明的黑白珠子刺激寶寶的視覺發展，喚醒聽覺意識
柔軟可愛的結構非常適合寶寶的環境
有紋理的手柄易於抓握，非常適合咬
click-clack環讓寶寶的聽覺意識參與其中
TAGS: 萌趣寶寶, 搖鈴, 咬咬玩具
tags: 萌趣寶寶, 搖鈴, 咬咬玩

originalTitle: Sassy Catch & Count Net
originalBody:
Sassy Catch and Count Net is a developmental learning toy that makes bath time fun! The three fish double as scoopers and strainers, and include numbers to learn counting. The easy to grasp net and fish are sized for baby's hands and help to develop hand and eye coordination. Multiple textures engage baby's sense of touch, and the bright contrasting colors aid baby's in visual development.
The Count ‘N Catch Net promotes early STEM learning by teaching a child about:
- Counting
- Sorting
- Buoyancy
Additional Product Details
Set includes 1 net & 3 colorful fish
Fish double as scoopers and strainers, and include numbers to learn counting
Scooping fish allows baby to fill, measure and pour water, introducing the concept of math
Chunky handle on net is easy for little hands to grasp 
3 colorful fish store neatly inside the net
title: Sassy Catch & Count Net
body:
Sassy Catch and Count Net是一款幼兒學習玩具，讓洗澡時間更有趣！這三條魚可以當勺子和過濾器，上面還有數字可以學習數數。易於抓握的網和魚的尺寸適合寶寶的手，有助於發展手眼協調能力。多種質地刺激寶寶的觸覺，明亮對比的顏色有助於寶寶的視覺發展。
Count ‘N Catch Net通過教孩子以下內容促進早期STEM學習：
- 數數
- 分類
- 浮力
其他產品詳細資訊
套裝包括1個網和3條彩色魚
魚可以當勺子和過濾器，上面有數字可以學習數數
用勺子捞魚可以讓寶寶灌水、量水和倒水，引入數學概念
網的厚實手柄易於小手抓握
3條彩色魚可以整齊地存放在網內
TAGS: Sassy Baby, Bath Toys

title: 好萊塢胸部提升貼
body:

- 1 對
TAGS: 好萊塢, 時尚

originalTitle: Hollywood Fashion Tape
originalBody:
Keep clothing and accessories in place with the help of 36 Easy-to-use, clear double-stick, “do everything” apparel and body tape!
Pre-cut, 3-inch disposable strips famous for rescuing woman from wardrobe malfunctions all across the world.
Hollywood Fashion Tape's specially formulated adhesive is gentle on skin, hypoallergenic and leaves no residue on skin.
Remove backing, press firmly to clean dry, oil-free skin or fabric. Remove remaining backing and apply to item to be secured. Remove tape before washing, cleaning or ironing garments. Pre-test fabrics.
If irritation or redness occurs, discontinue use. Do not apply to irritated, sunburned or sensitive skin. Pretest for sensitivity or allergies.
title: 好萊塢時尚膠帶
body:
使用36條易於使用的透明雙面膠帶，讓衣物和配件保持在原位！這些預先裁剪的3英寸一次性膠帶以拯救女性免受全球各地的衣櫥故障而聞名。
好萊塢時尚膠帶的特殊配方膠粘劑對皮膚溫和，低過敏性，並不會在皮膚上留下殘留物。
撕掉背膜，將膠帶牢牢按壓在乾淨、無油的皮膚或布料上。撕掉剩餘的背膜，貼在要固定的物品上。在清洗、清潔或熨燙衣物之前請先撕掉膠帶。預先測試布料。
如果出現刺激或紅腫，請停止使用。不要貼在受刺激、曬傷或敏感的皮膚上。預先測試是否對敏感或過敏。
TAGS: 好萊塢, 時尚

originalTitle: Paw Patrol Orange Fruit Drink (3x200ml)
originalBody:
Paw Patrol Orange Fruit Drink (3x200ml)
A wonderfully blended range of juices using all but natural ingredients to make a drink that is loved by the little ones and big ones alike. Keep the little ones happy with their favourite characters on their tasty drink boxes. With the additional use of natural stevia as a natural sweetener the drinks pack less sugar than many other brands.
Ingredients
water, fruit juices (50%) made from fruit juice concentrates (apple, orange), acidity regulator (citric acid), natural orange flavouring, sweetener (steviol glycosides).
title: Paw Patrol橘子果汁飲料 (3x200ml)
body:
Paw Patrol橘子果汁飲料 (3x200ml)
使用天然成分精心調製的果汁混合飲料，深受小朋友和大人喜愛。讓小朋友喜歡的角色出現在他們喜愛的飲料盒上，讓他們開心滿足。此飲料使用天然甜菊糖作為天然甜味劑，糖分比許多其他品牌更低。
成分
水、果汁（50%）（由果汁濃縮液（蘋果、橘子）製成）、酸度調節劑（檸檬酸）、天然橘子香料、甜味劑（甜菊糖苷）。

The diaper is designed to fit a child’s anatomy perfectly, which ensures there is no leakage and makes the child feel comfortable while enabling greater freedom of movement.

Latex-free, flexible protection
100% sterile
For use on minor cuts scrapes and burns 
Non-stick pad protects any laceration without sticking to the wound, which means pain free removal

originalTitle: All Terrain Kids Herbal Armor DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 2 oz.  / 60ml
originalBody:
All Terrain Kids Herbal Armor DEET-FREE Insect Repellent Spray 2 oz.  / 60ml
Safe, DEET-Free, Natural Insect Repellent
All Terrain sells effective skin protection products containing safe and clean ingredients to help people live more active, healthier lives. All Terrain’s products try to disprove the myth that if the products contain natural-based ingredients, it can’t work as well as chemical-based products. The products are developed by and for outdoor enthusiasts for use whether trekking in the backcountry or relaxing with family in your backyard.  In addition to wanting people to live healthier lives, the company is based on caring and a desire to protect the environment.
Enjoying an outdoor lifestyle comes with many benefits, but insects are not one of them! From hiking in the deep woods to lounging in the backyard, Herbal Armor DEET-free, Natural Insect Repellent travel-size is an effective and safe solution that uses a unique and extremely effective mixture of six essential oils (soybean, citronella, peppermint, cedar, lemongrass and geranium), to protect you from mosquitoes and other pesky insects, naturally. 
Keep your family safe and protected with All Terrain’s effective DEET-free insect repellent formula, while feeling good about how it is non-toxic and is not harmful to the environment. Herbal Armor Insect Repellent is perfect for active/adventurist people and families on the go.
• DEET-free
• GMO-free
• Over 26% active ingredients – among the highest 
• Uses six repelling oils – among the highest 
• Independently proven non-irritating & allergy tested
• Good for children and those with sensitive skin
• Won’t dame clothing or equipment
• Travel-size

title: Bambo Nature Snuggle Time Body Lotion 100ml
body:
Bambo Nature Snuggle Time Body Lotion is a gentle and soothing daily moisturizer suitable for babies and the whole family. It is made with natural and organic ingredients, free of perfumes, parabens, and dyes. This lotion is eco-friendly, vegan, and dermatologist tested.
TAGS: Bambo Nature, Skincare

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Love Balm Soothing Cream 100ml
originalBody:
Our Love Balm Soothing Cream helps shield your baby’s skin from excessive moisture. It creates a breathable protective barrier on the skin to keep it soft, smooth and nourished. Love Balm contains natural and organic ingredients, is vegan, dermatologist tested and eco-certified.
Aqua, Cocos Nucifera Oil*, Aloe Barbadensis Leaf Extract*, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Butyrospermum Parkii Butter*, Glycerin, Polyglyceryl-2 Dipolyhydroxystearate, Zea Mays Starch*, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil*, Polyglyceryl-3 Diisostearate, Hydrogenated Castor Oil, Magnesium Sulfate, Levulinic Acid, p-Anisic-Acid, Sodium Levulinate, Phytic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide
 *Ingredients from organic farming
The soothing cream helps protect your baby's skin from excessive moisture.
It forms a breathable protective barrier on the skin to keep the skin soft, smooth and nourished.
Contains natural and organic ingredients, tested by vegetarians, dermatologists and ecologically certified.
title: Bambo Nature Love Balm Soothing Cream 100ml
body:
我們的Love Balm舒緩霜有助於保護寶寶的皮膚免受過多濕氣的影響。它在皮膚上形成一層透氣的保護屏障，使皮膚保持柔軟、光滑和滋養。Love Balm含有天然和有機成分，是純素食、經皮膚科測試和生態認證的產品。
TAGS: Bambo Nature, 保養品

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Splish Splash Bath Oil 145ml
originalBody:
Bambo Nature Splish Splash Bath Oil is made with mild, natural oils that help maintain the skin’s moisture balance and leave it pleasantly soft when added to bath water or massaged into the skin. Our formula is free of perfumes, parabens and dyes and is dermatologically tested. Splish Splash can also be used for treating cradle cap. Its gentle, nourishing effect is great for baby’s skin.
Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Olus Oil, Brassica Campestris Seed Oil*, Brassica Napus Seed Oil*, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil*, Tocopherol, Glycine Soja Oil, Citric Acid
 *Ingredients from organic farming

Helps maintain the moisture balance of the skin, and

originalTitle: Abena Maternity Pads 14pcs
originalBody:
Abena´s Maternity Pads is a part of the Abena anatomically shaped range for mothers. Designed for light to heavy degrees of postnatal incontinence, Abena Maternity Pads will facilitate the postnatal phase so that you can concentrate of what really matters, your newborn child.
Abena Maternity Pads cover light to moderate incontinence. The product offers a unique protection against leakage with super soft and flat lengthwise barriers. It can be fixed via the use of the self-adhesive strips on the back of the pad. It has Abena’s Top Dry system, that allows the user to feel dry and comfortable, while letting the skin breathe.
   Optimum comfort and discretion
    Cotton – feel, fully breathable backsheet foil.
    Soft and reliable flat lengthwise side barriers
    Unique TopDry system, providing a dry surface and rapid absorption
    Odor system, minimizing any unpleasant smell
    Nordic Eco-Label
    Dermatologically tested
    FSC certified
    Latex-free and non-chlorine bleached
Designed specifically for postpartum urinary incontinence, it will promote the postpartum stage and make mothers feel relieved to focus on precious newborns. ​
Suitable for mild to moderate urinary incontinence. ​The product has a unique anti-leakage protection function, with a super soft and flat longitudinal barrier. ​It can be fixed by using the self-adhesive strip on the back of the pad. The top drying system allows users to feel dry and comfortable while allowing the skin to breathe.
Each mother uses an average of 40-50 yuan after delivery.
Optimal comfort and protection
Cotton-fully breathable, dry and comfortable
Soft and reliable flat longitudinal sidewall
Unique TopDry system provides a dry surface and fast absorption
Reduce any unpleasant odors
Nordic White Swan Eco Label
Passed FSC certification
Free of latex and non-chlorinated bleach

originalTitle: Sassy Fish Fasincation Station
originalBody:
Sassy Fish Fasincation Station
Age: 6 months +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
Use the suction cup base to attach the station to a flat surface and watch baby explore the many features of this station. The spinning wheel encourages baby to reach, tug and bat, strengthening hand-eye coordination. Each feature on the wheel spins individually when baby bats at it, introducing baby to cause & effect. The colorful beads trapped within the clear structures allow baby to connect the sound to sight. The toy’s handle is multi-textured, perfect for mouthing. This 2-in-1 toy can be suctioned to a table or high chair tray, or removed from the base for floor play.
Additional Product Details
2-in-1 toy; use suctioned to a table or high chair tray, or remove base for floor play
Intentionally designed to be batted at for activation, a skill that’s developmentally appropriate for baby at this age
Encourages baby to reach, tug, and bat, strengthening hand-eye coordination
Spinning ferris wheel provides a higher level of visual tracking
Multi-textured handle is perfect for mouthing

originalTitle: ThinkFun Hacker
originalBody:
ThinkFun Hacker
To beat a Hacker, you have to think like one.
Age: 10 yrs +
Brand: USA
Made responsibly in China
 
Empowering Minds Through Play
ThinkFun is the world’s leader in addictively fun games that stretch and sharpen your mind. From lighting up young minds to creating fun for the whole family, our innovative games make you think while they make you smile.
Mensa Mind Games Finalist – 2019
Can you outsmart cybercriminals? Defend the world from cybercriminals by joining the white hat hacker team Oblivion! Play the role of a coder, hacker, and security engineer in 40 beginner to expert challenges. Program your agents to collect data chips while avoiding viruses and alarms. As you discover how a hacker can damage your programs, you will learn how to secure them from future attacks! Each of the 40 challenges includes three phases of play for a total of 120 coding puzzles. Teaches: CONCURRENCY and SECURITY MINDSET

Mensa Mind Games 2019年決賽入圍者

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Rash Free Eco Training Pants Size-4 (L) 20pcs 7-14KG
originalBody:
5 packs per case / 每箱5包
Bambo Nature’s Rash Free ECO-friendly, disposable training pants are free of harmful chemicals and all known allergens. These training pants are designed to make potty training easy. Your toddler will feel like a big kid with our flexible, thin and easy to pull up and down design. Our training pants feature a three-layer design with super absorbent core that
 can stand up to multiple wettings—even overnight. 
And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.
7-14KG / 17-31LBS
 
Denmark non-allergic environmentally friendly baby learning pants, Size-4, L, 7-14 Kg, 20 pcs/pack
New upgrade function!
 
Wetness indicator
Developed the best and highest quality humidity display on the market. 100% free of harmful chemicals and non-allergic. The liquid sensitive strip will change color to indicate humidity.
 
Thinner designImprove moisture absorption technology to achieve maximum absorption and water retention capacity.
 The learning pants are thinner and more comfortable to wear without sacrificing their ability to absorb and retain water.
 
SofterUse better and softer materials to enhance comfort and protection.
 
The improved function of Bambo Nature Dream brings a refresher and more comfortable experience, which keeps dry and reduces the possibility of eczema.
 
Product description:
The Nordic White Swan eco-label on Bambo Nature confirms our efforts in environmental protection.
To obtain this label, our baby diapers must meet strict standards, several of which include:
Another label on our packaging, FSC forest certification, indicates that all wood pulp cotton used in our products comes from sustainable forests. Here, more trees must be planted than used.
At the same time, our products have also passed the tests of different independent authorities to ensure that Bambo Nature's diapers will not cause skin sensitivity or irritation.
In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.
Advantages of Bambo Nature Training Pants 
· This environmentally friendly diaper is definitely a good helper for children to learn to use the toilet
· Does not contain chlorine, fluorescent agent and lotion
· The wood pulp and cotton in the training pants are all made from free sustainable forest
· Waist and foot circumference without latex
· No chlorine bleaching
· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.

originalTitle: Bambo Nature Biodegradable Wet Wipes 50 counts
originalBody:
Bambo Nature Biodegradable Wet Wipes are a must-have for every baby changing table, diaper bag, handbag, road trip, picnic, sleepover – everywhere you and your baby go. Our skin-friendly, moisturizing cleaning wipes are made from soft, sustainable 100% viscose, which means that they do not contain plastic and are a better alternative for the environment. 我們的一次性嬰兒尿布是市場上最環保的尿布之一。製造過程中對環境非常關注，Bambo Nature生產的所有廢棄物中有95%被回收利用。此外，尿布標有北歐環保標籤、FSC®標籤、哮喘過敏標籤，並通過皮膚測試。
Bambo Nature很自豪地展示所有認證，以確保所有媽媽們的寶寶皮膚不受有害化學物質影響。我們可以保證這一點！

新升級功能！

產品描述：
Bambo Nature上的北歐白天鵝生態標籤證實了我們在環境保護方面的努力。
為了獲得這個標籤，我們的嬰兒尿布必須符合嚴格的標準，其中幾個包括：
我們包裝上的另一個標籤，FSC森林認證，表示我們產品中使用的所有木漿棉來自可持續森林。這裡必須種植更多的樹木。

And just like our diapers, Bambo Nature Training Pants have a fully breathable backsheet to keep delicate skin dry.

· The breathable back cushion allows the child's skin to breathe, avoiding skin sensitivity.

As easy as ABC! Our scrummy Alphabet Biscuits are great for 12 month+ toddlers learning letters and playing every day.

You’ll love them as much as your little one!

In order to cooperate with children's toilet training, the design of Bambo Nature training pants allows them to pull up and down easily. In addition, if necessary, training pants can also be opened from the side.

originalTitle: Bibs - COLOUR Pacifier Sage/Cloud 2pk LATEX
originalBody:
Made in Denmark
Natural rubber latex.
Recommended by midwives to support natural breastfeeding.
The shield is made of 100% food-safe material.
Completely free from BPA, PVC, and phthalates.
Designed and manufactured in Denmark/EU.
 
Description
Our Colour pacifier is the original BIBS pacifier and has been on the market for over 40 years. It has the signature round BIBS shield with three vent holes and round BIBS engraved handle ring. The nipple is round and resembles the shape and size of the mother's breast to provide comfort to your baby.
Cleaning
Before first use, place the pacifier in plenty of boiling water for 3 mins to ensure hygiene. When cleaning the pacifier subsequently, follow these three simple steps:
Put the pacifiers in a clean bowl. Pour them with plenty of boiling water.
Let the pacifiers soak for approx. 5 min.
Pick them up and let them dry on a clean towel.
After cleaning it is not unusual that water remains in the nipple,
simply just squeeze the nipple flat to press out the excess water.
If water drops remain in the nipple, just let the pacifier air-dry.
Do not cook!
Pacifiers are not meant to be boiled and are therefore destroyed by the high heat.
Instead, follow the instructions above, and you are sure to kill the bacteria without compromising the durability of the pacifier.
Don’ts
Do not leave natural rubber latex pacifiers in direct sunlight.
Do not put the pacifiers in the dishwasher.
Do not use UV for the pacifiers.
Do not freeze the pacifiers.
Do not steam over 100°.
TIP: When the child is over 3 months, you can also rinse the pacifier by placing them in a sieve and pouring them with boiling water. This method is faster and avoids water collecting inside the nipple.
Replacement

Natural rubber latex pacifiers must be replaced when you see the following signs:
Changes in the surface
Changes in size
Change in shape

title: 奶嘴 - 顏色奶嘴鼠尾草/雲朵 2入裝 天然乳膠
body:
丹麥製造
天然乳膠材質
助產士推薦，支持自然哺乳
奶嘴盾牌採用100%食品安全材質
不含BPA、PVC和鄰苯二甲酸鹽
丹麥/歐盟設計和製造

描述
我們的顏色奶嘴是原始的BIBS奶嘴，已在市場上銷售超過40年。它具有標誌性的圓形BIBS盾牌，帶有三個通風孔和圓形BIBS刻字手柄環。奶嘴是圓形的，形狀和大小與母親的乳房相似，為您的寶寶提供舒適感。

清潔
首次使用前，將奶嘴放入沸水中煮3分鐘以確保衛生。隨後清潔奶嘴時，請按照以下三個簡單步驟進行：
將奶嘴放入乾淨的碗中。倒入足夠的沸水。
讓奶嘴浸泡約5分鐘。
拿起奶嘴，讓它們在乾淨的毛巾上晾乾。
清潔後，奶嘴中可能殘留水分，只需將奶嘴擠平以擠出多餘的水分。
如果奶嘴中仍有水滴，只需讓奶嘴自然晾乾。
不要煮！
奶嘴不應煮沸，高溫會破壞奶嘴。
請按照上述說明進行，確保殺死細菌而不影響奶嘴的耐用性。

禁忌
不要將天然乳膠奶嘴暴露在直射陽光下。
不要將奶嘴放入洗碗機。
不要使用紫外線處理奶嘴。
不要將奶嘴冷凍。
不要蒸超過100°。
提示：當孩子超過3個月時，您也可以將奶嘴放在篩子中沖洗，然後倒入沸水。這種方法更快，避免水滴在奶嘴內部積聚。

更換
出於安全和衛生原因，我們建議每4-6週更換奶嘴。
當您看到以下徵兆時，必須更換天然乳膠奶嘴：
表面變化
尺寸變化
形狀變化
材質破裂
變得脆弱或黏膩
TAGS: 10+個月, 12+個月, 6+個月, Bibs, 奶嘴

originalTitle: Bibs - COLOUR Pacifier Vanilla/Blush 2pk LATEX
originalBody:
Made in Denmark
Natural rubber latex.
Recommended by midwives to support natural breastfeeding.
The shield is made of 100% food-safe material.
Completely free from BPA, PVC, and phthalates.
Designed and manufactured in Denmark/EU.
 
Description
Our Colour pacifier is the original BIBS pacifier and has been on the market for over 40 years. It has the signature round BIBS shield with three vent holes and round BIBS engraved handle ring. The nipple is round and resembles the shape and size of the mother's breast to provide comfort to your baby.
Cleaning
Before first use, place the pacifier in plenty of boiling water for 3 mins to ensure hygiene. When cleaning the pacifier subsequently, follow these three simple steps:
Put the pacifiers in a clean bowl. Pour them with plenty of boiling water.
Let the pacifiers soak for approx. 5 min.
Pick them up and let them dry on a clean towel.
After cleaning it is not unusual that water remains in the nipple,
simply just squeeze the nipple flat to press out the excess water.
If water drops remain in the nipple, just let the pacifier air-dry.
Do not cook!
Pacifiers are not meant to be boiled and are therefore destroyed by the high heat.
Instead, follow the instructions above, and you are sure to kill the bacteria without compromising the durability of the pacifier.
Don’ts
Do not leave natural rubber latex pacifiers in direct sunlight.
Do not put the pacifiers in the dishwasher.
Do not use UV for the pacifiers.
Do not freeze the pacifiers.
Do not steam over 100°.
TIP: When the child is over 3 months, you can also rinse the pacifier by placing them in a sieve and pouring them with boiling water. This method is faster and avoids water collecting inside the nipple.
Replacement
We recommend a replacement of pacifiers every 4-6 weeks for both safety and hygienic reasons.
Natural rubber latex pacifiers must be replaced when you see the following signs:
Changes in the surface
Changes in size
Change in shape
Rupture in the material
Becomes brittle or sticky

首次使用前，將奶嘴放入沸水中煮3分鐘以確保衛生。清潔奶嘴時，請按照以下三個簡單步驟進行：
將奶嘴放入乾淨的碗中。倒入足夠的沸水。
讓奶嘴浸泡約5分鐘。
取出並讓其在乾淨的毛巾上晾乾。
清潔後，奶嘴中可能殘留水分，只需擠壓奶嘴扁平以擠出多餘的水分。
如果奶嘴中仍有水滴，只需讓奶嘴自然晾乾。
不要煮！
奶嘴不應煮沸，高溫會破壞奶嘴。
請按照上述說明進行，確保殺死細菌而不影響奶嘴的耐用性。
禁忌
不要將天然乳膠奶嘴暴露在直射陽光下。
不要將奶嘴放入洗碗機。
不要使用UV燈。
不要冷凍奶嘴。
不要蒸超過100度。
提示：當孩子滿3個月時，您也可以將奶嘴放在篩子中沖洗，然後倒入沸水。這種方法更快，避免水滯留在奶嘴內部。
更換
出於安全和衛生原因，我們建議每4-6週更換一次奶嘴。
當您看到以下徵兆時，必須更換天然乳膠奶嘴：
表面變化
尺寸變化
形狀變化
材質破裂
變得脆弱或黏膩

originalTitle: Bibs - COLOUR Pacifier Dusky Lilac/Heather 2pk LATEX
originalBody:
Made in Denmark
Natural rubber latex.
Recommended by midwives to support natural breastfeeding.
The shield is made of 100% food-safe material.
Completely free from BPA, PVC, and phthalates.
Designed and manufactured in Denmark/EU.
 
Description
Our Colour pacifier is the original BIBS pacifier and has been on the market for over 40 years. It has the signature round BIBS shield with three vent holes and round BIBS engraved handle ring. The nipple is round and resembles the shape and size of the mother's breast to provide comfort to your baby.
Cleaning
Before first use, place the pacifier in plenty of boiling water for 3 mins to ensure hygiene. When cleaning the pacifier subsequently, follow these three simple steps:
Put the pacifiers in a clean bowl. Pour them with plenty of boiling water.
Let the pacifiers soak for approx. 5 min.
Pick them up and let them dry on a clean towel.
After cleaning it is not unusual that water remains in the nipple,
simply just squeeze the nipple flat to press out the excess water.
If water drops remain in the nipple, just let the pacifier air-dry.
Do not cook!
Pacifiers are not meant to be boiled and are therefore destroyed by the high heat.
Instead, follow the instructions above, and you are sure to kill the bacteria without compromising the durability of the pacifier.
Don’ts
Do not leave natural rubber latex pacifiers in direct sunlight.
Do not put the pacifiers in the dishwasher.
Do not use UV for the pacifiers.
Do not freeze the pacifiers.
Do not steam over 100°.
TIP: When the child is over 3 months, you can also rinse the pacifier by placing them in a sieve and pouring them with boiling water. This method is faster and avoids water collecting inside the nipple.
Replacement
We recommend a replacement of pacifiers every 4-6 weeks for both safety and hygienic reasons.
Natural rubber latex pacifiers must be replaced when you see the following signs:
Changes in the surface
Changes in size
Change in shape
Rupture in the material
Becomes brittle or sticky
